Name: X-linked monogenic disease
Definition: A monogenic disease that has_material_basis_in muations in genes on the X chromosome.

Name: Y-linked monogenic disease
Definition: A monogenic disease that has_material_basis_in muations on the Y chromosome.

Name: autosomal genetic disease
Definition: A monogenic disease that has_material_basis_in a mutation in a single gene on one of the non-sex chromosomes.

Name: familial hemophagocytic lymphohistiocytosis 5
Definition: A hemophagocytic lymphohistiocytosis that has_material_basis_in a mutation of STXBP2 on chromosome 19p13.2.

Name: Alport syndrome
Definition: A monogenic disease that is characterized by glomerulonephritis
